name: College of Spirits
description: These bards channel tales and spirits, bringing stories to life with occult trappings.

3.name: Guiding Whispers
3.description: You learn the guidance cantrip, and its range for you is 60 feet.

3.name: Spiritual Focus
3.description: You can use items like a candle, crystal ball, skull, spirit board, or tarokka deck as a spellcasting focus; starting at 6th level, roll a d6 to add to one damage or healing roll when using it.

3.name: Tales from Beyond
3.description: While holding your focus, as a bonus action expend a Bardic Inspiration to roll on the Spirit Tales table, retaining the tale to bestow its effect later.

6.name: Spirit Session
6.description: Conduct a 1-hour ritual with willing creatures to temporarily learn one divination or necromancy spell from any class, with level up to the number of participants.

14.name: Mystical Connection
14.description: When rolling on the Spirit Tales table, roll twice and choose which effect to use; if you roll the same number, choose any tale.
